remarks: Symbols to the left of a splice are unaffected.  (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 23-Aug-2015.)
statement:
spllen.s $e |- ( ph -> S e. Word A ) $.
spllen.f $e |- ( ph -> F e. ( 0 ... T ) ) $.
spllen.t $e |- ( ph -> T e. ( 0 ... ( # ` S ) ) ) $.
spllen.r $e |- ( ph -> R e. Word A ) $.
splfv1.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. ( 0 ..^ F ) ) $.
splfv1 $p |- ( ph -> ( ( S splice <. F , T , R >. ) ` X ) = ( S ` X ) ) $.
